channel.title: Best Guide to 10 Hp and 99 mage!
channel.description:
[center]10 Hp 99 Mage Pure[/center]
Ok Here Are The Steps...
While in Tutorial Island get 3 Mage. Make sure you have aleast 100k to transfer to your new mage.
First- You need to go to the Rune Store and buy 1k body runes (why store? because they are 3-5 ea in store)
Second- Buy 1k Waters also, make sure they are cheap...
Third- Go buy an Earth Staff.
Fourth- Go buy full iron, use staff as weapon. (why buy full iron?)(Because if you miss you get 25% more xp.
5th- Go to the varrock castle where the zammrock mage is behind the stairs.
[URL=http://www.imagehosting.com] [IMG]http://www.imagehosting.com/out.php/i1094960_Untitled1copy.jpg[/img][/URL]
Now Do this manually or auto.
Go to your spell book, click confuse.
Then click on mage.
Do this alot.
It will not get your hitpoints level up.
I suggest not using a mouse recorder because you will get banned so easy because it does the same keystrokes every time.
Thanks For Reading.
I am such a noob

item.title: Best Guide to 10 Hp and 99 mage!
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

exe626:

You maintain a lower level for a reason, so you can fight lower leveled people without them knowing your so much stronger than them. If your gonna keep about 60 hp with 90+ ranged at what, level 55? I don’t think most level 50-60 would survive more than 5hits at the most.

w/e man just go masturbate you know you’ll like it

Read full topic

item.title: Best Guide to 10 Hp and 99 mage!
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

exe626:

Lower hp, higher stats at a low Combat. You deal more damage to lower leveled people not requiring such a high hp level.

but higher lvled people most likely have better stuff

Horrible Guide
[/quote]
Read Ahead, this is mostly for Poor people[br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2007, 10:52:33 PM[/size][hr]you also dont have to do it till 99,
